channel.title: VALVe Letting Developers Set Their Own Pricing
channel.description:
"Valve says developers can now set their own prices and sales on Steam! Could this be the beginning of cheaper PC Games?"
[url='https://www.tweaktown.com/news/36167/valve-is-now-letting-developers-set-their-own-pricing-on-steam/index.html']https://www.tweaktown.com/news/36167/valve-is-now-letting-developers-set-their-own-pricing-on-steam/index.html[/url]
